sentence.text: When ertapenem is co-administered with probenecid (500 mg p.o. every 6 hours), probenecid competes for active tubular secretion and reduces the renal clearance of ertapenem.
Based on total ertapenem concentrations, probenecid increased the AUC by 25% and reduced the plasma and renal clearances by 20% and 35%, respectively.
The half-life increased from 4.0 to 4.8 hours.
Because of the small effect on half-life, the coadministration with probenecid to extend the half-life of ertapenem is not recommended.
sentence.negationtags: Because of the small effect on half-life, the coadministration with probenecid to extend the half-life of ertapenem is <scope> <cue> not </cue> recommended. </scope>

sentence.text: In vitro studies indicate that ertapenem does not inhibit P-glycoprotein-mediated transport of digoxin or vinblastine and that ertapenem is not a substrate for P-glycoprotein-mediated transport.
sentence.negationtags: In vitro studies indicate that ertapenem does <scope> <cue> not </cue> inhibit P-glycoprotein-mediated transport of digoxin or vinblastine and that ertapenem is not a substrate for P-glycoprotein-mediated transport. </scope>

sentence.text: In vitro studies in human liver microsomes indicate that ertapenem does not inhibit metabolism mediated by any of the following six cytochrome p450 (CYP) isoforms: 1A2, 2C9, 2C19, 2D6, 2E1 and 3A4.
sentence.negationtags: In vitro studies in human liver microsomes indicate that ertapenem does <scope> <cue> not </cue> inhibit metabolism mediated by any of the following six cytochrome p450 (CYP) isoforms: 1A2, 2C9, 2C19, 2D6, 2E1 and 3A4. </scope>

sentence.text: Drug interactions caused by inhibition of P-glycoprotein-mediated drug clearance or CYP-mediated drug clearance with the listed isoforms are unlikely.
sentence.negationtags: <scope> Drug interactions caused by inhibition of P-glycoprotein-mediated drug clearance or CYP-mediated drug clearance with the listed isoforms are <cue> unlikely. </cue> </scope>

sentence.text: Other than with probenecid, no specific clinical drug interaction studies have been conducted
sentence.negationtags: Other than with probenecid, <scope> <cue> no </cue> specific clinical drug interaction studies have been conducted </scope>
